intrebare?: How can you identify issues such as broken links, duplicate content, and site speed problems?
raspuns1: By conducting a comprehensive audit of a website's SEO performance.
raspuns2: By attracting a large volume of organic traffic to your website.
raspuns3: By analyzing real-world case studies to understand how SEO strategies are applied in different industries.
raspuns4: By using emerging technologies like AI, chatbots, Augmented and Virtual Reality.
raspuns corect: By conducting a comprehensive audit of a website's SEO performance.

intrebare?: Explain the difference between a "do-follow" and a "no-follow" link.
raspuns1: no-follow links are placed in anchor text, while “do-follow" links are not.
raspuns2: do-follow links are considered when crawling a webpage, while "no-follow" links are not.
raspuns3: no-follow links improves a website page authority (PA). “do-follow" links do not.
raspuns4: Using more "no-follow" links than “do-follow" links improves page loading speed.
raspuns corect: do-follow links are considered when crawling a webpage, while "no-follow" links are not.

intrebare?: Define the term "conversion rate" in the context of digital marketing.
raspuns1: Refers to the percentage of website visitors that become customers.
raspuns2: Refers to the amount of profit made, compared to the investment.
raspuns3: “conversion rate” indicates if an A/B testing campaign was successful.
raspuns4: “conversion rate” is determined by a thorough Pay Per Click (PPC) audit and is used to make adjustments to the email marketing strategies.
raspuns corect: Refers to the percentage of website visitors that become customers.
